title: Museum of Modern Art For Sale - By Reason of Bankruptcy (Musée d'Art Moderne à vendre - Pour cause de faillite)
medium: Artist's book. Letterpress dust jacket wrapped around catalogue for Kölner Kunstmarkt '71 with artist's inscriptions
dimensions: sheet (unfolded): 17 11/16 x 33 3/4" (45 x 85.8 cm); overall (folded, with catalogue): 17 11/16 x 12 5/8 x 5/16" (45 x 32 x 0.8 cm)
credits: Partial gift of the Daled Collection and partial purchase through the generosity of Maja Oeri and Hans Bodenmann, Sue and Edgar Wachenheim III, Agnes Gund, Marlene Hess and James D. Zirin, Marie-Josée and Henry R. Kravis, and Jerry I. Speyer and Katherine G. Farley
